arts.ttl: Nuno Brings Back the Bite and Something West Ham Have Desperately Been Missing
arts.sum: West Ham fought back to claim a point against David Moyes’ Everton – and it hadn’t escaped my attention that it was precisely that fight which has been missing from the Hammers for so long. With less than two full training sessions with his new players, Nuno Espirito Santo had little chance to stamp detailed […] Source

arts.ttl: West Ham 'great' Bowen earns point at Everton in Nuno's first game
arts.sum: Captain Jarrod Bowen earned a point for new West Ham boss Nuno Espirito Santo in a 1-1 draw at Everton on Monday Night Football.

arts.ttl: Everton v West Ham United | Starting XI revealed for Nuno’s first game
arts.sum: At last West Ham United fans have a match to look forward to – the away fixture against Everton had been earmarked as ‘one to bear through gritted teeth’ until Graham Potter was surprisingly sacked at the weekend and Nuno Espírito Santo appointed in his stead. arts.ttl: West Ham United XI vs Everton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: A new era begins for West Ham United on Monday night as Nuno Espírito Santo takes charge of his first match away at Everton. The Portuguese manager was appointed on Saturday morning following the dramatic sacking of Graham Potter, with the club sitting 19th in the Premier League table. arts.ttl: Everton vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton welcome West Ham to their new Hill Dickinson Stadium fortress on Monday, aiming to bounce back from a disappointing week.
